message:
Nice extension. Thanks!

Would be great if it could also do custom urls. Not sure if slyme API supports that.

e.g. if typing: url https://ext.ulauncher.io/-/... lurl

could make a custom url: https://5ly.me/lurl
author: jasir

posts.message:
Hey,
I've updated the extension to work as you described!
Enjoy ;)
